name: FROGMAN 3D
description:
Welcome to FROGMAN 3D

Swing, jump, and grapple your way to the end!

Cody Mescal - Programmer, Level Design

Jared Fisher - Programmer

Dakota Hensley -  Modeler, Rigger, Animator

Will Aman - UI, UX, Character Design

Remember! You cant grapple while standing on a surface, and make sure to use smaller, quick swings, instead of long slow ones!
